pragma solidity >=0.6.0 <0.9.0;

contract Recurse {

    uint[100] public values;

    constructor() {
        values[1] = 1;
    }

    function recurse(uint256 depth) external {
        values[1] = values[1] + 1;

        if (depth % 50 == 0) {
            values[1] = 0;
        }

        if (depth > 0) {
            this.recurse(depth - 1);
        }
    }

}
end
